alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 10:14PM EST until December 19 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with up to 12 inches in a few locations. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Until noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult due to snow covered roads and reduced visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow will begin tonight north of Route 28 and Old Forge and slowly shift southward late Sunday morning into the afternoon. The snowband may oscillate north of Route 28 early Sunday evening before shifting southward overnight into Monday morning. Snowfall rates may reach 1 inch an hour at times. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4385 7495 4392 7506 4399 7511 4398 7517 4389 7513 4371 7514 4371 7511 4362 7512 4361 7504 4365 7500 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D19T0000Z COORD...4363 7473 4388 7504 4408 7512 4398 7517 4343 7511 4340 7508 4325 7511 4333 7500 4338 7484 4348 7476 TIME Y22M12D19T0000Z-Y22M12D19T1700Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
